coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Printed on the inside, a small tag reads 'Made by solace'.
coreAttributes.name: slave skirt
coreAttributes.description: A metal skirt with a long, heavy loincloth which covers very little of the wearer. These are typically worn only by slaves.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt up to [npc.her] hips and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt up to [npc2.namePos] hips and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt up to [npc2.namePos] hips and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc2.namePos] waist as tightly as possible.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] skirt and [npc.verb(let)] it fall from [npc.her] hips.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc2.namePos] skirt and [npc.verb(let)] it fall from [npc2.her] hips.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc.her] skirt back into place, covering [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] skirt back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(snap)] [npc2.namePos] skirt back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
